REPOSILITE_INITIAL_ADMIN_USER.description: The username for the initial Reposilite admin token (e.g., 'admin', 'root').

REPOSILITE_INITIAL_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: A STRONG password for the initial Reposilite admin token. You MUST change this default.

REPOSILITE_OPTS.description: Optional: Additional command-line arguments for Reposilite (e.g., '--title "My Awesome Repo"').
